74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.changes: All Orbs in the Orb Vallis are now immune to the effects of Corrosive Projection.

74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.name: Mask of the Revenant: Hotfix 23.7.1
74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.changes: Improved squad info dropdown to better fit long Warframe names (Trinity Prime, etc) and long Aura names (Corrosive Projection, etc).

74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.name: Mask of the Revenant: Update 23.7.0
74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.changes: We’re aware and working on improved line breaking for longer text Auras like Corrosive Projection, etc.

74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.5.2
74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.fixes: Fixed the Sharpened Claws Kavat Mod giving Armor removed by 4 Corrosive Projections back to enemies. Bad kitty!

74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.fixes: Fixed the Hyena Pack being immune to the Corrosive Projection Aura.

74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.name: Hotfix 15.5.5
74e23d48e7a922ee0c2bd29467335c6d.fixes: Fixed Infested Swarm Armor buff overriding player’s Corrosive Projection Aura.

8a6bddb71611ef4c285cce8b0daf8c6e.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.4.0
8a6bddb71611ef4c285cce8b0daf8c6e.changes: Dead Eye has gone from 35% to 52.5% at Max Rank.

8a6bddb71611ef4c285cce8b0daf8c6e.name: Update 14.9.0
8a6bddb71611ef4c285cce8b0daf8c6e.changes: Changed the Dead Eye Aura mod. Dead Eye is restricted to snipers and now offers a maximum of 35% damage increase.

8a6bddb71611ef4c285cce8b0daf8c6e.name: Update 13.5.0: Edo Armor & Nami Solo
8a6bddb71611ef4c285cce8b0daf8c6e.fixes: Added a Codex entry for Dead Eye.

df96eb13a76367242d6e6c3b307d2f05.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.2 + 19.3.2.1
df96eb13a76367242d6e6c3b307d2f05.fixes: Fixed Growing Power and Empowered Blades no longer working after using a Focus ability. Should also fix it not working in the Simulacrum if you have it equipped and then open the Arsenal.

706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.8
706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.fixes: Fixed the Enemy Radar Mod not showing Pobbers, Bolarolas, and Sawgaws on the minimap.

706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.2 + 19.3.2.1
706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.changes: Hid Rathuum Broadcasters from Enemy Radar to avoid confusion.

706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.changes: Tumor nodes will now display on your minimap with the Enemy Radar Mod equipped.

706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.name: Update 15.13
706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.fixes: Fixed some enemy types not appearing on the minimap for clients, or showing up as enemies of the player that has the Enemy Radar Aura equipped.

706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.name: Update 14.5: Operation Cryotic Front!
706e908fd0036c7c636296bb44b2b7a3.changes: • Banshee's Sonar, and the Enemy Radar/Sense mods ignore security cameras and turrets.

43dbb2166d80dc3b8723f759ba10eff1.name: Update 5.3 - "Blazing Embers"
43dbb2166d80dc3b8723f759ba10eff1.changes: Balancing changed for Energy Siphon cards, Mods with shield, energy, and health bonuses will be additive for more sane stacking.

05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.0.4
05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.fixes: Fixed Artax not functioning with Growing Power.

05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.changes: A buff icon for Toxic Lash is now displayed so you can see the bonus (ie: after Growing Power, Energy Conversion, and other temporary power-strength buffs are applied).

05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.fixes: Fixed Growing Power scaling indefinitely for Clients as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/833798-growing-power-scales-infinitely/

05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.2 + 19.3.2.1
05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.fixes: Fixed Growing Power and Empowered Blades no longer working after using a Focus ability. Should also fix it not working in the Simulacrum if you have it equipped and then open the Arsenal.

05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.name: Hotfix 19.0.5
05c8e3dd062f3dd28e0f2ee8b997a538.fixes: Fixed the Growing Power Aura not applying for Clients.

db829ae8c716a7dae5ca26c621da88f4.name: Update 13.8.0: Breeding Grounds
db829ae8c716a7dae5ca26c621da88f4.changes: Infested Impedance Aura mod has been changed to be a radial affect around the player instead of the whole map indiscriminately.

db829ae8c716a7dae5ca26c621da88f4.name: Hotfix 11.5.6
db829ae8c716a7dae5ca26c621da88f4.changes: Changed Infested Impedance Aura to reduce speed by only 3%/level to prevent squads of four from stopping all Infested completely (now a maximized team should reduce infested speed by 72%).

a66c1d6e95d1aefe1fbda757b161b581.name: Update 19: The War Within
a66c1d6e95d1aefe1fbda757b161b581.fixes: Fixed a low glow effect on the Loot Detector Mod.

a66c1d6e95d1aefe1fbda757b161b581.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 2
a66c1d6e95d1aefe1fbda757b161b581.fixes: Fixed Loot Detector’s glow effect being too dim for Mods.

33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.10
33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.changes: Increased the Physique Aura Mod from providing +18% Health to +90% Health (at max rank).

33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.name: Update 19.13.0
33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.fixes: Fixed the Physique Aura applying inconsistent Health values to each squadmate.

33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.fixes: Fixed weapon attachments in the Arsenal not displaying ‘Physique’ under Appearance when viewing Bows.

33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.fixes: Fixed the Attachments options in the Arsenal / Appearance overlapping the Physique menu.

33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.changes: Fixed the appearance submenu in Arsenal having an extra top "Physique" title and bottom line in the middle of its elements when selecting certain melee weapons that have both a skin slot and an attachments submenu.

33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.name: Update 12: Zephyr Rises
33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.changes: Physique Aura rebalanced (+3% Health per level)

33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.name: Update 7.4 Hot-Fixes
33074e2bda5b655ca17fae7437bd5680.fixes: Fixed Physique Artifact Card not bestowing increased max health on Host

fa5b0fd72cee750a94beae7df2dedd07.name: The Silver Grove: U2.1 + U2.2
fa5b0fd72cee750a94beae7df2dedd07.fixes: Fixed the Pistol Amp Aura Mod not amping Mesa’s Peacemaker.

fa5b0fd72cee750a94beae7df2dedd07.name: The Silver Grove: U2
fa5b0fd72cee750a94beae7df2dedd07.fixes: Fixed the Pistol Amp Aura Mod not increasing pistol weapon damage.

af24002c1a8c07aa160dd33eaa591eae.name: Chimera: Hotfix 23.10.6
af24002c1a8c07aa160dd33eaa591eae.changes: Updated terminology for the Power Donation Mod to read "Ability Strength" instead of "Power Strength."

af24002c1a8c07aa160dd33eaa591eae.name: Chimera: Hotfix 23.10.3
af24002c1a8c07aa160dd33eaa591eae.fixes: Fixed an issue where Power Donation could allow for true <0% Power Strength scenarios.

bc09d2983b694ad5f4876174289f1876.name: Hotfix 13.1.2
bc09d2983b694ad5f4876174289f1876.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Rejuvenation Aura mod not healing Sentinel health.

bc09d2983b694ad5f4876174289f1876.name: Update 12: Zephyr Rises
bc09d2983b694ad5f4876174289f1876.changes: Rejuvenation Aura rebalanced (+.5% Heal Rate per level).

9fa0577a6762febe774c3d88672206e9.name: Update 19.13.0
9fa0577a6762febe774c3d88672206e9.changes: Rifle Amp and Shotgun Amp Auras now apply to Titania’s Dex Pixia weapons.

9fa0577a6762febe774c3d88672206e9.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 3 (Nekros Prime!)
9fa0577a6762febe774c3d88672206e9.changes: Buffed the Shotgun Amp Aura Mod to feel more comparable to Rifle Amp. It is now 18% at Max Rank.

9fa0577a6762febe774c3d88672206e9.name: Hotfix 9.1.1
9fa0577a6762febe774c3d88672206e9.fixes: Fix for Rifle Amp Aura stacking. A word from the designer: Rifle Amp, 45% damage buff stacking was too much, reduced to 27& (4.5% base).This was a typo on my part.

4128f881632239e8af5c77e831f59fae.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.9 + 24.2.9.1
4128f881632239e8af5c77e831f59fae.fixes: Fixed Oberon's Hallowed Ground one shotting enemies whose Shields have been removed via the Shield Disruption Aura in the Index.

4128f881632239e8af5c77e831f59fae.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.5
4128f881632239e8af5c77e831f59fae.changes: Profit-Taker is no longer affected by the Shield Disruption Aura.

55e3a71f254b38098ba40674e7da6e54.name: Update 19.13.0
55e3a71f254b38098ba40674e7da6e54.changes: Rifle Amp and Shotgun Amp Auras now apply to Titania’s Dex Pixia weapons.

55e3a71f254b38098ba40674e7da6e54.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 3 (Nekros Prime!)
55e3a71f254b38098ba40674e7da6e54.changes: Buffed the Shotgun Amp Aura Mod to feel more comparable to Rifle Amp. It is now 18% at Max Rank.

fe701f05571a01becf8968060cc4238f.name: Hotfix 13.6.1
fe701f05571a01becf8968060cc4238f.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Shotgun Scavenger mod providing ammo bonuses for non-shell type ammunitions.

a0f6934ad565600986331e96502cc60d.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.4.0
a0f6934ad565600986331e96502cc60d.changes: Speed Holster has gone from 80% to 120% at Max Rank.

540d717e6ec358eeb672e368ecc766a6.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
540d717e6ec358eeb672e368ecc766a6.fixes: Fixed the Sprint Boost Mod description not displaying % Sprint Speed.

540d717e6ec358eeb672e368ecc766a6.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.4.0
540d717e6ec358eeb672e368ecc766a6.changes: Sprint Boost Aura has gone from 10% to 15% at Max Rank.

540d717e6ec358eeb672e368ecc766a6.name: Update 12: Zephyr Rises
540d717e6ec358eeb672e368ecc766a6.changes: Sprint Boost Aura Rebalanced and re-released into Alert System.  (+2.5% per level, 10% overall).

5db48777c1d9ae627557055fb57f855d.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.3.1
5db48777c1d9ae627557055fb57f855d.additions: Added proper localization to Stand United, Precision Munition, Thundermiter, Draining Gloom and Heartseeker Mods.

28e4a4ba39dc05ef50ecb69812f3e66d.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
28e4a4ba39dc05ef50ecb69812f3e66d.fixes: Fixed an issue where the Steel Charge Aura had a duplicate stat in the description.

28e4a4ba39dc05ef50ecb69812f3e66d.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
28e4a4ba39dc05ef50ecb69812f3e66d.changes: Ash’s Blade Storm is now affected by the Steel Charge Aura Mod.

28e4a4ba39dc05ef50ecb69812f3e66d.name: Update 12.2.0: Castanas!
28e4a4ba39dc05ef50ecb69812f3e66d.changes: Steel Charge Aura changed from 10 rank Aura mod to 5 rank Auramod, see further information here: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/182094-steel-charge-update/

28e4a4ba39dc05ef50ecb69812f3e66d.name: Update 12: Zephyr Rises
28e4a4ba39dc05ef50ecb69812f3e66d.changes: Steel Charge Aura rebalanced (+5% Damage per level).

2a0395e82020f97a8b86f8940545e3f8.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.3.0
2a0395e82020f97a8b86f8940545e3f8.fixes: Fixed Toxin Resistance Mod not being tradable.

2a0395e82020f97a8b86f8940545e3f8.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.6
2a0395e82020f97a8b86f8940545e3f8.fixes: Fixed Toxin Resistance's description (added % for clarity).
